Description: Fragment of oval handle from neck join to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff. Rectangular stamp with anchor symbol.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '43'. Name Drakontidas. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0264.17?
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (140)
